request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Issue_management

**Description**: Returns ListRequestTypes

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/issue-management/request-types

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/issue-management/request-types' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
  {
            "id": 100,
            "name": "Request for Quotation",
            "description": "",
            "due_date_tolerance": 7,
            "default_status": {
                "id": 100,
                "value": "Open",
                "name": "Open",
                "description": "",
                "sequence": 1,
                "is_default": true
            },
            "is_default": false
        },

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Issue_management

**Description**: Returns ExistsIssues

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/issue-management/issues/{table_name}/{record_id}/exists

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

table_name (String,Mandatory)

record_id (Int32,Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/issue-management/issues/C_DocTypeCounter/100/exists' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": 0
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- table name not found in logs
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Tabla * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Issue_management

**Description**: Returns ListStatuses

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/issue-management/status-categories/{status_category_id}/statuses/{request_type_id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

request_type_id (Int32,Mandatory)

status_category_id (Int32,Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/issue-management/status-categories/100/statuses?request_type_id=100' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
            "id": 100,
            "value": "Open",
            "name": "Open",
            "description": "",
            "sequence": 1,
            "is_default": true
        },

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- request type id not found in logs
    

``` json
{
    "record_count": "0",
    "records": [],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |
